text: Álvaro Clopatofsky was a sports shooter from Colombia. Álvaro competed in the 25 metre pistol event at the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born on April 20, 1921 and died in 1993.Álvaro Clopatofsky == References == Category:1921 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Colombian sport shooters Category:People from Bogotá
title: Álvaro Clopatofsky
